definition: native to or inhabiting the sea, a soldier who serves both on shipboard and on land
details:
adjective
- native to or inhabiting the sea
= example: native to or inhabiting the sea
- relating to or characteristic of or occurring on or in the sea
- of or relating to the sea
= example: of or relating to the sea
- of or relating to military personnel who serve both on land and at sea (specifically the U.S. Marine Corps)
= example: of or relating to military personnel who serve both on land and at sea (specifically the U.S. Marine Corps)
- relating to or involving ships or shipping or navigation or seamen
= synonyms: nautical
noun
- a soldier who serves both on shipboard and on land
